textBox.richText: Friday is the big Lovers Playhous party at Trinity I am promoting. As part of my compensation for promoting the party I got to choose a really nice Halloween costume from Lovers, an adult store sponsoring the event. I am going to be Snow White : ) Now my job is to get as many people as possible on my guest list. I’m supposed to be getting my costume soon. My plan is to wear it downtown, hand out party flyers with my card attached, and write down peoples’ names on the street so I can add them to my list right then. Getting on my list means you get in free so it shouldn’t be too hard... I’ll let you know how that goes.
